name: Canada Moist Talkers Cross-Stitch Logo
description:
This is a cross-stitch pattern of Blaseball's Canada Moist Talkers'. This design is about 7.5 inches in diameter. This is made with Stitch Fiddle, and is free to download. Thank you and as always, the commissioner is doing a great job! 

Original logo by Q Peiffer. @longhairQ
